lyric:
[by:矩阵]
[00:23.07]There's a reason she's alone
[00:26.02]You can't pin her down
[00:27.89]Because no one needs her home
[00:31.52]Or needs her around, she says
[00:33.96]"There's beauty in the hills
[00:37.21]A chip in the sky
[00:38.90]So don't be sad because I roam
[00:42.27]It keeps me alive."
[00:44.90]
[00:47.77]To impress her - it's too damn hard
[00:53.20]To stay loyal without going too far
[00:58.71]If I see her again promise I won't
[01:02.45]Cry
[01:07.84]
[01:31.48]To impress her - it's too damn hard
[01:37.42]To stay loyal without going too far
[01:42.42]If I see her again promise I won't
[01:46.35]Cry
[01:51.73]
[01:52.48]She wasn't back tonight
[01:55.10]And I don't know about you
[01:57.72]My money's on the night
[02:00.35]It takes her away like I do
[02:03.22]My charm is twinkling out of her eyes
[02:09.67]Of her eyes
[02:12.27]
[02:12.83]She will never grow old
[02:15.90]Or change her mind
[02:17.59]She'll talk about it later on
[02:21.22]From seeing sights
[02:23.14]There's something wonderful and odd about the escape
[02:28.59]While you want them to be gone
[02:32.15]You want them to stay
[02:35.21]
[02:37.45]To impress her it's just so damn hard
[02:43.02]I want her back, please don't go too far
[02:48.47]If I see her again promise I won't
[02:52.20]Cry
[02:57.22]
[03:21.30]To impress her is just too damn hard
[03:26.68]To stay loyal without going too far
[03:32.56]If I see her again, promise I won't
[03:36.11]Cry
[03:40.90]
[03:42.10]She doesn't come back much
[03:44.80]No one misses her like I do
[03:47.35]I hope she's having fun
[03:49.40]Doing what she wants to
[03:52.40]And send a postcard or two from the sights
[03:58.16]Sometime
[04:02.91]
[04:05.41]To impress her is just too damn hard
[04:10.58]And I want her back but she's gone too far
[04:15.93]If I see her again, promise I won't
[04:20.43]Cry
tlyric:
[by:Vloisa-]
[00:23.07]她选择了孤独
[00:26.02]她不可能驯服
[00:27.89]她说，“因为没有人需要我”
[00:31.52]“也没有人愿意陪伴我”
[00:33.96]“群山自有其壮美之处”
[00:37.21]“仿若苍穹中一道缺口”
[00:38.90]“不要伤心，我将漫游于天地”
[00:42.27]“我的生命不息”
[00:47.77]想走进她的心？——太难了
[00:53.20]誓忠于她，但请止步于此吧
[00:58.71]若与她再度相会，我将不再
[01:02.45]泪流满面
[01:31.48]想走进她的心？——太难了
[01:37.42]誓忠于她，但请止步于此吧
[01:42.42]若与她再度相会，我将不再
[01:46.35]泪流满面
[01:52.48]今夜她终是不归
[01:55.10]我本并不了解你
[01:57.72]今夜漆黑夜幕，笼罩我的财富
[02:00.35]她随财富而去，如同曾经的我
[02:03.22]我的魅力已经消散于她的双眸
[02:09.67]她的双眸
[02:12.83]她将会永葆青春
[02:15.90]她已经下定决心
[02:17.59]某日她重新说起
[02:21.22]那些路过的风景
[02:23.14]一路逃亡中邂逅的美妙与怪奇
[02:28.59]当你想要挥散它们之时
[02:32.15]却又希望它们能够停留
[02:37.45]想走进她的心？——太难了
[02:43.02]我呼唤她归来，请不要走远
[02:48.47]若与她再度相会，我将不再
[02:52.20]泪流满面
[03:21.30]想走进她的心？——太难了
[03:26.68]誓忠于她，但请止步于此吧
[03:32.56]若与她再度相会，我将不再
[03:36.11]泪流满面
[03:42.10]时至今日，她不曾归来
[03:44.80]没有人像我这般思念她
[03:47.35]我真心祝愿她旅程愉快
[03:49.40]去做些她喜欢做的事儿
[03:52.40]也许寄回一两张明信片
[03:58.16]偶尔的话……
[04:05.41]想走进她的心？——太难了
[04:10.58]我呼唤她的归来，但她已走得太远
[04:15.93]若与她再度相见，我发誓我将不再
[04:20.43]泪流满面
